title: Tesla launches official Steam integration
description: The full Steam store is available on new Model S and X cars with 16GB RAM.

title: Why do relaxing farming life sims stress me out so much?
description: They're meant to be cozy, casual, and stress-free. So why do I wind up rage-quitting them so often?

title: Future Dwarf Fortress 'creative mode' will let you sculpt whole worlds, dream up homemade gods
description: A long-planned magic system is "like payoff for all the work we've been doing," says Dwarf Fortress's Tarn Adams.

title: Starfield's faction quests will play more like Skyrim than Fallout 4
description: Lead quest designer Will Shen said players will be able to play all the faction quests independently—but won't necessarily be able to become their leader.

title: You can now pet Geralt's horse in The Witcher 3, and it's about time
description: CD Projekt confirmed that the ability to pet Roach is an official, surprise addition in today's free next-gen update.

title: Epic is delisting almost every Unreal game, but making Unreal Tournament 3 free
description: Epic is moving to exclusive support of its online services suite, and that means older games are gone.

title: Critical Role's Matt Mercer will voice Minsc in Baldur's Gate 3
description: Today's big Baldur's Gate 3 update adds the paladin class, increases the level cap, and adds a "reaction system." And you can fly!

title: 2K's launcher seems to negatively impact Midnight Suns' performance, but you can turn it off
description: Failure to launch.

title: Destiny 2 Dawning ingredients: How to bake cookies and farm essence

title: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is shaping up to be a stellar CRPG
description: Owlcat Games' latest has shot to the top of my most-wanted list.

title: Halo Infinite's terrible, horrible, no good, very bad year
description: Halo Infinite missed its moment. Can it claw its way back?

title: The Witcher 3's free next-gen update is out now, but some players report performance issues
description: While some are enjoying the update, others have to roll back to an older patch.

title: Overwatch 2's Winter Wonderland event is back and actually has an earnable skin this time
description: Just the one, but it's better than Halloween Terror.

title: One of the last EVGA GPUs to ever be made is currently going for $9,500 at a charity auction
description: Have we got $10,000 in the room?

description: This new armor piece stops you from taking fall damage.

description: There's a lot more to do in the Dragon Isles.

title: How to enable cross-platform progression for The Witcher 3: Complete Edition
description: You don't have to start all over again if you don't want to.

title: This nuclear fusion breakthrough is giving us major Fallout vibes, in a good way
